title: How about some George Carlin...
content:
Does anyone like this? It was my first bit of fun in Illustrator.  
I have to do 9 more posters of George Carlin quotes to do...so your input will be put to good use :) Do you think that the choice of type is good with the image?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023104938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FixedFinal2_6152.jpg)

i have to post this one as a pdf apparently...
